cn.edu.xjtu.se.jackq

Class ConnectFourGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • cn.edu.xjtu.se.jackq.ConnectFour
      • cn.edu.xjtu.se.jackq.ConnectFourGUI

  • public class ConnectFourGUI
extends ConnectFour
    A simple Swing application which implements a GUI version of ConnectFour based on its console version.
    Author:
    Jack Q (qiaobo@outlook.com)
    See Also:
    ConnectFour

    • Method Detail

      • dropCurrentDisk

        private int dropCurrentDisk(int column)
        A convenient method to drop a disk in currentColor
        Parameters:
        column - the column index where to drop the disk
        Returns:
        the number of disks in the column after dropping this disk, which is also the index of the last disk counted form bottom.
        See Also:
        ConnectFour.dropDisk(int, int)

      • nextStep

        private void nextStep()
        request for a new step after dropping a disk. This program will check whether the game have finished

        Show the window of the game

        entry point for start an new game
        Parameters:
